HomePage.heroSubtitle: Reliable, efficient, and high-quality electrical installations for your projects
HomePage.aboutText: We offer top-tier electrical installation and contracting services with years of experience and customer satisfaction.
HomePage.service1Desc: Comprehensive electrical system design and installation.
HomePage.service2Desc: Advanced lighting solutions for residential and commercial needs.
HomePage.service3Desc: Structured network and power distribution systems.
HomePage.service4Desc: Reliable maintenance services for all electrical systems.
HomePage.service6Desc: Efficient energy usage solutions for cost savings.
HomePage.contactText: Get in touch with us for consultations or project inquiries.

AboutPage.title: About Electrical Load
AboutPage.subtitle: A leading electrical installation company serving Kurdistan with quality, safety, and professionalism.
AboutPage.missionDescription: To provide innovative, reliable, and sustainable electrical solutions while maintaining the highest standards of safety and quality through skilled engineers and technicians.
AboutPage.visionDescription: To become one of the most trusted electrical contracting companies in the region, recognized for excellence, efficiency, and customer satisfaction.
AboutPage.value1Description: We deliver high-quality electrical services using professional standards and best practices.
AboutPage.value2Description: Safety is our top priority in every project we execute.
AboutPage.value3Description: We build long-term relationships through trust, transparency, and reliable service.

CareerPage.title: Career Opportunities
CareerPage.subtitle: Join our team and help shape the future of electrical engineering
CareerPage.position1Description: We are looking for an experienced electrical engineer to join our team. You will work on designing and implementing electrical systems for various projects.
CareerPage.position2Description: Lead and coordinate electrical projects from conception to completion. Manage teams, budgets, and timelines to ensure successful project delivery.
CareerPage.position3Description: An excellent opportunity for recent graduates to start their career in electrical engineering. We provide mentorship and growth opportunities.
CareerPage.benefit4: Flexible working hours and remote options

FuturePage.title: Our Future
FuturePage.subtitle: Discover our roadmap and vision for the years ahead
FuturePage.goal1Description: We are investing heavily in research and development to stay at the forefront of electrical engineering innovation. Our goal is to integrate AI and IoT technologies into our solutions.
FuturePage.goal2Description: Expanding our presence to new markets and regions, bringing our expertise and solutions to clients worldwide. We aim to establish offices in key strategic locations.
FuturePage.goal3Description: Committed to sustainable practices and green energy solutions. We are working towards carbon-neutral operations and promoting renewable energy integration.
FuturePage.goal4Description: Building a diverse and talented team of professionals. We plan to double our workforce over the next three years while maintaining our culture of excellence.
FuturePage.roadmapStep1Description: Strengthen our core services and expand our team with top talent. Launch new product lines and establish key partnerships.
FuturePage.roadmapStep2Description: Introduce AI-powered solutions and expand into new markets. Focus on sustainable energy projects and green technology integration.
FuturePage.roadmapStep3Description: Become a recognized leader in the industry. Expand globally and establish ourselves as the go-to partner for complex electrical engineering challenges.

Footer.description: Professional electrical contracting and installation services for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.
